resources.string:
1. Enter a width and height in the text box, whole number only decimal numbers are not accepted.
2. After entering the width and height, press enter then a kitten picture that match the width and height that the user entered will show up on the screen.
3. Press the save button will save the last width and height that the user entered.
4. Click on one of the Kitten picture will show you a detail page with the kitten picture and the width, height and date of the picture loaded.
5. Click on the add to favourite button to save a kitten picture to the favourite list.
6. Click on the toolbar on the top right corner to view the favourite list.
Do you want to save the text that you entered?
You have save the text successfully!
The width of this image is
The height of this image is
Click the image to see detail
Image has been added to favorites
Do you want to remove this picture from your favourite list?
Image has been remove from the favorites list
Enter the topic your are interested in

1. Type in a keyword or phrase related to the topic you are interested in. 2. Hit the search button and browse the search results: it will display a list of search results based on your keyword or phrase. 3. If you are not finding what you are looking for, try refining your search by using more specific keywords or phrases. 4. Click on a search result to view more information: Once you find a search result that interests you, click on it to view more information. 5. Save or share the information: If you find something useful, you can save it for future reference or share it with others using the app is sharing features.
Do you want to delete the message:

To search for a forecast, type in the name of the city you want to get the forecast for, then tap the \"Search\" button. To get more details about a saved forecast, tap on a forecast under \"My forecasts\". To delete a saved forecast, tap the \"Delete\" button, then select \"Yes\".
Do you want to delete this forecast?
To save the forecast, tap on the \"Save button\".
